attributes.action: For Coca-Cola to play the classic christmas advert that was made in the 90's. To be for this 2008 christmas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I hope to encourage Coca-cola to play the classic coca-cola advert on british television in the christmas 2008. I feel the classic coca-cola christmas advert put's the fun & christmasy feel back into britain.

Thank you, Please Vote. Merry XMAS.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
